display_long_description:
"VR Sparring Partner" is a boxing app for enhancing counterattacks through parries and blocks.

Key features:

Counterpunching
Parry or block to increase opponent damage briefly, enabling quick defense-to-counter transitions.

Damage Calculations
Damage is based on punch angle and speed, aiding in faster, more precise punching techniques.

Partner Customization
Customize your partner's moves for practicing counters against various punches.

Partner Types
Choose from short-range or long-range partners with different punching styles to match your training needs.

Stance Selection
Choose between orthodox and southpaw stances to strengthen your weaker side.

Viewpoint Adjustment
Change the avatar position to review your movements and improve your spatial awareness during training.

Gaze Guide
Earn bonus damage by aligning punches with a frontal guide line, promoting accuracy.

This game combines engaging play with effective training, ideal for solo home workouts.

Time to train!
